description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
hosting facility where the participants lived (ks = kumamoto sanctuary/ mpi = zoo leipzig
fb1= false belief 1 / fb2= false belief 2
tgt =  location where the actor falsely believed the object to be / dist= distractor (the other location)
the difference in viewing times between the target and distractor
